parameters.body: ={{ JSON.stringify({ job_id: $json.jobId, section_index: 0, section_id: 'complete', section_title: 'Article Complet', content: { html: $json.articleHTML, score: $json.currentScore, iterations: $json.currentIteration } }) }}

parameters.responseBody: ={{ { ok: true, jobId: $json.jobId, topic: $json.topic, finalScore: $json.currentScore, iterations: $json.currentIteration, status: 'completed', message: 'Article generated and saved successfully' } }}
